thread.section_title: Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Still the Best!
thread.title_full: Still the Best! - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Joseph M
title: Still the Best!
text: This hotel is simply terrific. We are repeat guests and we have never been disappointed. Manager John Taboado and his entire staff treat guests as if they were members of a family. The location is ideal for exploring the city and the amenities available in Rick's make our stay even more reasonably priced. The Casablanca is the only place we would stay in New York.
